sentence: Ecolab Inc. ( ECL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.275 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 15, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased ECL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that ECL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $114.75, the dividend yield is .96%.
The previous trading day's last sale of ECL was $114.75, representing a -1.16% decrease from the 52 week high of $116.10 and a 20.95% increase over the 52 week low of $94.87.
ECL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
ECL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.57.
Zacks Investment Research reports ECL's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 18.28%, compared to an industry average of 10.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ECL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
